Work

Nacho Truck Locator

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, ES6, jQuery

It is an app that can help people find local tocao trucks around their neighborhoods. It uses a gps to find them around the city and then tells the user their exact location so that the user can find out where they are.
